name: LouderVoice Reviews
author: LouderVoice

sections.description: This plugin enables LouderVoice clients to quickly and easily display customer reviews on their WordPress site.
sections.installation:
Upload the LouderVoice plugin to your site and activate it.

Go to Settings -> LouderVoice Settings and add your LouderVoice API key, Facebook App ID, and LouderVoice CSS URL.
LouderVoice will give you these it you don’t already have them.

Then create a new page on your site where you wish to display reviews and tick the “Enable Reviews” box. Decide on the basic options presented and finally decide if you want open-reviewing on that page or you want a separate private review-writing page which you invite people to.

Further details and a full instruction manual are available from support@loudervoice.com
sections.changelog:
0.3

  • Initial release

0.31

  • Removed some breaking test code

0.32

  • Fixed layout issues

0.33

  • Plugin can now indicate that it needs to be updated in WordPress Admin

0.34

  • First public release

0.35

  • Fix for error about language files on certain hosts using PHP safe mode

0.36

  • Fix for small tags glitch if no default tags set

0.37

  • Fix for warning which may be displayed if DEBUG enabled

0.38

  • Improved Review-Writing Page setup. Fix for small tags issue

0.39

  • Added per-page override for language to facilitate multi-lingual sites

0.4

  • Small fix to allow item name to be changed in two-page setups

0.41

  • Use Amazon CDN for improved performance

1.00

  • Some localisation improvements

1.10

  • Lots of localisation improvements including taglines

2.23

  • Big version bump to avoid confusion with old LouderVoice plugin on WordPress Plugin Repository site

2.24

  • Reduced WP version requirement to v3.0

2.5

  • Version problem now fixed

2.51

  • Removed en_IE, de_CH and fr_CH langauge variations due to Facebook issue.

2.52

  • Added TweetThis button to all reviews.

2.53

  • Open LouderVoice links in new window

2.54

  • Fix one of the footer links

2.55

  • Integrated in a new rich-snippets Average Score Sidebar Widget and a Random Review Sidebar Widget

2.56

  • Improved styling on Random Review Widget

2.57

  • Fixed tiny regression in review links

2.59

  • Typo

2.60

  • Show nothing in random review widget if site has no reviews yet

2.61

  • Bug in last release which caused some styling problems. Now fixed.

2.62

  • Changed “count” to “votes” in average score widget

2.63

  • Disabled SSL check for https access to LouderVoice API and changed to wp_remote_get for retrieval from LouderVoice API

2.64

  • Fix simple name clash

2.65

  • Making https the default for everything including cdn.loudervoice.com

2.66

  • Removed deprecated Auth methods Facebook and Twitter

2.67

  • Small adjustment to average score widget

2.68

  • Add logo

3.00

  • Now compatible with WordPress 4.3+ including WordPress 5.x

short_description: Accept and Display LouderVoice Reviews on your site.
description: This plugin enables LouderVoice clients to quickly and easily display customer reviews on their WordPress site.
